entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Matagami
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:15 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Matagami Airport 12:13 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure: 99.6 kPa
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: S 41 km/h gust 65 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 26 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 27 January 2023
